name: Alchemy for Dummies
description:
It's a game about trying to figure out how to cure patients by experimenting on patients! Side effects may include fun, boredom, warts, or turning into a frog.

Made for Global Game Jam 2020: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/alchemy-dummies-7

Made by:

  • Jay Dancer
  • Martin Forget
  • Jeffrey Lin
  • Ian Wark

Music:

  • Seven Sisters by Skill Borrower
  • Arcan by Doxent Zsigmond

Attribution Noncommercial (3.0)
